stepTitle: Which statement best describes a system at equilibrium in analytical chemistry?
choices: All reactions have stopped and no further chemical change occurs.
The forward and reverse reaction rates are equal, and the concentrations of reactants and products remain constant over time.
Reactants have been fully converted to products.
The reaction mixture contains equal moles of reactants and products.
